extendedInfo.description: Gameday Extra is the official app from the Green Bay Packers Radio Network and Green Bay Packers Television Network, bringing you all your gameday updates when you want them, wherever you are, and itâs all FREE! The Gameday Extra app includes: - Green Bay Packers news updates from NBC 26, Todayâs TMJ4, The Milwaukee Journal Sentinel, Packers.com, NFL, ESPN and other sources breaking news. - Updates from veteran sports broadcasters Wayne Larrivee and Larry McCarren. - A full list of where you can listen live to the Packers games on gameday. - Live radio streaming audio of the pre-game and post-game coverage from Newsradio 620 WTMJ AM in Milwaukee, plus your tailgate music soundtrack from 94.5 FM The Lake. - The official weather forecast for Lambeau Field from NBC 26 Chief Meteorologist Cameron Moreland, including radar and current conditions that change automatically based on where you are. - Upload and share your tailgate and fan photos or videos using iContribute, plus see the green and gold celebration from other fans across Wisconsin and beyond - Green Bay Packers player roster, schedule and standings. - Tweets from the broadcast team, Green Bay Packers and NFL. - Broadcast stations and schedule for the Mike McCarthy Show, Packers Extra and Inside Lambeau. - Multi-connection video support for the edge network, 3G and WiFi, providing automatic video adjustment for a superior viewing experience. - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app. I always look forward to the articles. Love the notifications too. I\'ve never been so connected and on top of  everything going on with the Packers!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works very well with my android. good source for Packer information.
reviews.author: Rich Lund

reviews.title: Penultimate Packer backer app
reviews.comment: The most comprehensive app covering the Packers.
reviews.author: Patrick Bedroske

reviews.title: Great Info
reviews.comment: Could be simoler to switch between options rdther than backing out
reviews.author: Gary Rippie

reviews.title: Nosy app
reviews.comment: The news sources for this app are first rate. But there is no justifiable reason for this app needing to know what other apps I have on my device. For this reason, I will not be updating. And if the app eventually quits working without the update, I will delete it before I give in. Mind your own business, DoApp!
reviews.author: Adam Heinrich

reviews.title: Ok but
reviews.comment: Want to watch the game i got charter why can\'t i watch it on my razor?
reviews.author: Dan Bowers

reviews.title: Seems like a great app
reviews.comment: Minimal ads and good condensed info thats ready to navigate.just has to downgrade rating. Seemsa if connection is sketchy no matter of on 3g or wireless
reviews.author: Timothy Lund

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: I suggest this app to anyone who loves the Pack.
reviews.author: Rick Bykowski

reviews.title: vertical only
reviews.comment: It will not rotate to horizontal which would be better on a tablet... limited media options
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No unique content
reviews.comment: Yes, you get stuff from multiple sites but nothing else. It\'s ok.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Looking good I\'ll update more after the game   thanks for the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love it its great it keeps me up to date
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gameday Extra
reviews.comment: Love the app would like the players to be listed numerically. Has everything I would want. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Needs to be able to have alerts for each quarter and final
reviews.author: A Google User
